find_program(BASH bash)

set(DATA_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/data)

# Clear all temporary files generated by the tests in ${DATA_DIR}

execute_process (
    COMMAND ${BASH} -c "rm -rf ${DATA_DIR}/tmp* ${DATA_DIR}/*-tmp-*"
)

function(add_binary_tests file_path)
    get_filename_component(file_name ${file_path} NAME_WE)

    # Add a custom target for IDEs to pickup the test script
    add_custom_target(test_${file_name} SOURCES ${file_path})

    file(STRINGS ${file_path} FILE_CONTENTS)

    list(LENGTH FILE_CONTENTS FILE_CONTENTS_LENGTH)
    math(EXPR MAX_LINE_NUM "${FILE_CONTENTS_LENGTH} - 1")

    set(target_list ${all_targets})

    foreach(line_num RANGE ${MAX_LINE_NUM})
        list(GET FILE_CONTENTS ${line_num} line)
        string(REGEX REPLACE " +" ";" line_tokens "${line}")
        set(new_line "")

        # Since executables are not in PATH we need to manually replace relative paths
        # with full paths
        foreach(token IN LISTS line_tokens)
            if("${token}" IN_LIST target_list)
                list(APPEND new_line "$<TARGET_FILE:${token}>")
            else()
                list(APPEND new_line ${token})
            endif()
        endforeach()

        string(REPLACE ";" " " new_line "${new_line}")

        set(test_name ${file_name})
        if(${FILE_CONTENTS_LENGTH} GREATER 1)
            set(test_name "${file_name}_${line_num}")
        endif()

        add_test(
            NAME bintest_${test_name}
            COMMAND ${BASH} -c "${new_line}"
            WORKING_DIRECTORY ${DATA_DIR}
        )
        message(VERBOSE "Add binary test command for ${file_name}: ${new_line}")
    endforeach()
endfunction()
